definitions.definition: One who or that which checks or verifies something.
One who makes a check mark.
The clerk who tallies cost of purchases and accepts payment.
examples: There was a long line at the grocery store because the checker was so slow.

definitions.definition: One who hinders or stops something.

main_definition: One who or that which checks or verifies something.
secondary_definitions: One who makes a check mark.
The clerk who tallies cost of purchases and accepts payment.
One who hinders or stops something.

definitions.definition: A playing piece in the game of checkers (British: draughts ), or certain other table games such as backgammon .
A pattern of alternating colours as on a chessboard.
An individual square appearing in such a pattern.

main_definition: A playing piece in the game of checkers (British: draughts ), or certain other table games such as backgammon .
secondary_definitions: A pattern of alternating colours as on a chessboard.
An individual square appearing in such a pattern.

definitions.definition: The fruit of the wild service tree or chequer tree , Photinia villosa , syn. Sorbus terminalis

main_definition: The fruit of the wild service tree or chequer tree , Photinia villosa , syn. Sorbus terminalis
